results.content: Very good course, specifically aimed at beginners. Very easy to follow. Lots of core simple steps, good intro to Django
results.content_html: Very good course, specifically aimed at beginners. Very easy to follow. Lots of core simple steps, good intro to Django

results.content: Good starting point to Django. Good to see the use of PyCharm. The Heroku part is not for everybody. Deploying to a regular webserver would be great. Video's are long. Shorter would be better.
results.content_html: Good starting point to Django. Good to see the use of PyCharm. The Heroku part is not for everybody. Deploying to a regular webserver would be great. Video's are long. Shorter would be better.

results.content: Quick start guide for a fully DEPLOYED Django app. Great to get started learning a new framework. Not great for beginners to programming but doable.
results.content_html: Quick start guide for a fully DEPLOYED Django app. Great to get started learning a new framework. Not great for beginners to programming but doable.

results.content: This is a very nice precise course for beginners for Django.  Not every course on udemy is for beginners as this course.
results.content_html: This is a very nice precise course for beginners for Django. Not every course on udemy is for beginners as this course.

results.content: Perhaps can have an example how to deploy a Django application where it is not hosted with a specific provider, e.g hosting in own VPS.
results.content_html: Perhaps can have an example how to deploy a Django application where it is not hosted with a specific provider, e.g hosting in own VPS.

results.content:
This course is really good for the beginner, as advertised.  You get walked through installing all tools and creating an interesting (actually amusing) example application.  

I like that this course shows the use of Pycharm which is a really powerful developer's tool for Python and Django.  Most large projects will use an IDE and other courses only show you building an application with a text editor (e.g. Sublime).  

And you learn about the SQL Lite database browser and can peek inside your local database and see the built in admin tables as well as your user defined tables.  

You also get introduced to deploying your application to the Heroku server environment and setting up DNS.  

The teacher is dynamic and funny making the course that much more interesting.
results.content_html:
This course is really good for the beginner, as advertised. You get walked through installing all tools and creating an interesting (actually amusing) example application.

I like that this course shows the use of Pycharm which is a really powerful developer's tool for Python and Django. Most large projects will use an IDE and other courses only show you building an application with a text editor (e.g. Sublime).

And you learn about the SQL Lite database browser and can peek inside your local database and see the built in admin tables as well as your user defined tables.

You also get introduced to deploying your application to the Heroku server environment and setting up DNS.

The teacher is dynamic and funny making the course that much more interesting.

results.content: Simplified and covers all beyond expectation.
Too much of talk sometimes leads to confusion as well as diversion from the actual learning.
results.content_html: Too much of talk sometimes leads to confusion as well as diversion from the actual learning.

results.content: Instructions are very clear and helpful.
he used F word, it's unacceptable

The Course is Amazing and I loved the way the instructor explains complex topics in a very engaging and friendly manner.

Highly recommended
results.content_html:
